headline: Abbott receives CE Mark for the TactiFlex™ Duo Ablation Catheter to treat patients with abnormal heart rhythms
summary: Abbott (NYSE: ABT) today announced it has received CE Mark in Europe for the TactiFlex™ Duo Ablation Catheter, Sensor Enabled™ to treat patients with atrial fibrillation (AFib). Following the new approval, the first successful commercial cases using TactiFlex Duo in the European Union were completed this week.

headline: Exact Sciences (EXAS) Rose Following the Acquisition Announcement by Abbott
summary: Fred Alger Management, an investment management company, released its “Alger Small Cap Focus Fund” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The US equity market ended the fourth quarter on a strong note, with the S&P surging 2.7%, maintaining its steady upward momentum. Investors’ optimism was supported by better-than-expected corporate […]

headline: Earnings live: 3M stock sinks, D.R. Horton rises to kick off busy week of earnings
summary: A broader set of sectors will be represented when 35 more S&P 500 companies report earnings this week, including Netflix, Procter & Gamble, and Intel.
